lead_paragraph: Storytelling is as much a part of the lore of Billy Goat Tavern as “cheezborgers” and the ink-stained wretches who ducked out of newspaper offices to down a shot and a beer.
snippet: Storytelling is as much a part of the lore of Billy Goat Tavern as “cheezborgers” and the ink-stained wretches who ducked out of newspaper offices to down a shot and a beer.

headline.main: The Pulse: Where Everybody Knows His Name
